Measurements. BL: 3.9–4.8 mm , FL: 2.5–3.0 mm. HW: 0.93–1.09 mm , PL: 079– 0.92 mm , PW: 0.74–0.87 mm , EL: 1.00– 1.30 mm , EW: 1.02–1.30 mm , SL: 0.87–1.11 mm . Head 0.83–0.94 times as wide as elytra; Pronotum 1.00–1.11 times as long as wide; Elytra 0.98–1.06 times as long as wide.
Variability. The aedeagi of the specimens from Zhejiang are variable in the length and width of lateral lobes.
Distribution. China ( Sichuan , Guizhou , Jiangxi , Guangdong , Zhejiang ), Vietnam . New to Zhejiang.
Remarks. One character of the species, which could be normally niglected, is the shorten abdomen. And it will be easy to recognize the species by this character even in the field.
